title: Toe Tags & TNT
description: Inspired by a True Life experience. The adventure starts in Las Vegas and ends at the BASS PRO SHOPS in Springfield, Missouri. What do a mortuary an ex-con; a Grateful Dead groupie and TNT have to do with Route 66 and BASS FISHING? Climb aboard the motor home and get ready for a wild and frightening cross country trip with a dying and dangerous, psychotic old man who kidnaps and holds hostage a motley crew. Wired with explosives, he creates a story that is BLOOD CURDLING HILARIOUS. â˜®
author: Rolland Love
